Trigger special (see below)

Requirements You are in either the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.lczkHT2svCEpGYaV]{Oath of Blades} or the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.actions.Item.D1B0CJtMuz6w4uxy]{Oath of Shields} stance.

You manipulate your aetheric signature briefly to switch oaths on the fly. You switch from the oath of blades to the oath of shields or vice versa. Each oath has a trigger condition that must be met for you to switch out of it, shown below.

  • Oath of Blades You would be hit by an attack

  • Oath of Shields You have just Cast a Spell or made a Strike, but before effects are resolved

In both cases, apply the bonuses of the stance you switch into for the purposes of the trigerring effect of this action; for oath of blades, that would be applying the +1 bonus to AC, potentially turning a hit into a miss.
